entry.name: applicationStatusShown
entry.label: If true, the items of "Application status" category are shown in the systray.

entry.name: communicationsShown
entry.label: If true, the items of "Communications" category are shown in the systray.

entry.name: systemServicesShown
entry.label: If true, the items of "System services" category are shown in the systray.

entry.name: hardwareControlShown
entry.label: If true, the items of "Hardware Control" category are shown in the systray.

entry.name: miscellaneousShown
entry.label: If true, the items of "miscellaneous" category are shown in the systray.

entry.name: extraItems
entry.label: All plasmoid items that are explicitly enabled in the systray. It's a comma-separated string list of plasmoid plugin ids.

entry.name: hiddenItems
entry.label: All items that are hidden, forced always in the popup. It's a comma-separated string list of unique identifiers that are either plasmoid plugin ids or StatusNotifier ids.

entry.name: shownItems
entry.label: All items that are shown. It's a comma-separated string list of unique identifiers that are either plasmoid plugin ids or StatusNotifier ids.

entry.name: showAllItems
entry.label: If true, all systray entries will be always in the main area, outside the popup.

entry.name: iconSize
entry.label: Default icon size for the systray icons, it's an enum which values mean, Small, SmallMedium, Medium, Large, Huge, Enormous respectively. On low DPI systems they correspond to 16, 22, 32, 48, 64, 128 pixels. On high DPI systems those values would be scaled up, depending on the DPI.

entry.name: pin
entry.label: Whether the popup should remain open when another window is activated
